actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from Army, DOT, HUD, Justice, OMB.

official_title: A bill to provide that no relocation payments made under the Uniform Relocation Assistance Act shall be paid to persons who are unlawfully present in the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Uniform Relocation Assistance and Real Property Acquisition Policies Act of 1970 to prohibit payments under such Act to persons unlawfully in the United States.

titles.title: A bill to provide that no relocation payments made under the Uniform Relocation Assistance Act shall be paid to persons who are unlawfully present in the United States.
